On network permissions and usage

This app functions by using a strictly local networking layer to talk between the player and the game -- currently no data is sent in or out of the phone. Nonetheless, this local network still requires networking permission, and such internal data transfer may show up as total app usage.

Please Read!

Rio Grande Games, the publisher of Dominion, has asked us to discontinue Androminion as they launch their official digital version of the game. As such, this will (probably) be the last major revision; Androminion will be removed from the market soon. Thanks to all of you who have contributed to the project, submitted bug reports, or spread the word -- without you Androminion would not be as polished and popular as it is today.

On behalf of the Androminion team, it has been fun.
-:ankur

Want greater ability to choose your own kingdom cards? You can now launch Androminion directly from DominionShuffle!

Version 2.0

It has been a long while in coming, but we hope this update will have been worth the wait! There are so many changes that we can\'t list them all here, but below are some highlights:

* More expansions! Most of the cards from Alchemy, Prosperity, Cornucopia, and Hinterlands are now available.
* More game options! Chose from various random or preset decks, with 2-4 players.
* More AI options! Introducing new AIs Chuck, Mary, and Sarah.
* More bugfixes! Also more bugs, probably.
* Same great taste!

Androminion is now open source! This update would not have been possible without the help of a number of contributors; please view the credits tab. You too can help! Submit bug reports, feature requests, translations, and more on
http://androminion.googlecode.com
